name: Jacobson Rost
tagline: We exist to tell true stories.
description:
At Jacobson Rost we exist to tell true stories. All this means is that we do the hard work of discovering a brand’s most compelling truth and we tell that story in an engaging, human way that will lead to transactions.
We tell our stories with iframes and apps, web videos and TV spots, experiential events and trade shows, print and digital ads, through social networks and influencers, and via traditional marketing and PR. Because when you’re committed to telling the truth in a candid way across channels, the way you tell it comes organically from the story itself. No rules. No barriers.
READ MORE...
